entry.title: About Cattum Party
entry.content:
Cattum Party is the only choice for Garfcord which will guarantee freedom and safety for all Garfers.

Why should you vote for us?

  • MORE CATPOSTING OPTIONS - we will bring back the catposting channel
  • MORE SILLINESS - the amount of silly will increase dramatically
  • BETTER GOOGAS - By voting for the CCP you will be achieving better GOOGAS
  • INCREASED CATPOSTING - the amount of cat media on the server will be the highest ever seen
entry.summary: Cattum Party is the only choice for Garfcord which will guarantee freedom and safety for all Garfers.
